data.text: Jekopu'a amanage huno mika ne'mofavre'amokizmi zamasmi'ne, Henkama tamagrite'ma fore hania zamofo nanekea tamasamigahuanki,
Jekopu mofavre naga'nimota tamagra eme atru huneta tamagesa anteta nerafa'na Israeli'na hanua nanekea antahiho.
Rubeniga nagonesa mofavremoka,
Hianagi timo hageno eviankna huno, nagakafina ran kagia omanegahie.
Simioni'ene Livaikea kogna mani'na'e.
Nagri knare antahi antahimo'a, tanagri antahi antahifina omanegahie.
Tanarimpa ahe'zantera tusi huneranantoe. Na'ankure tanarimpa ahezamo'a arava ohegahie.
Judaga kafu kaganaza kagi erisga hugahaze.
Judaga laioni anenta kna hu'nane.
Judaga kva vahe'mokizmi azompamo'a kagripi mevava hugahie.
Donki anentara krepire nofiteti rentesnankeno manigahie.
Agra rama'a waini tina nenegu huno tare avurgamo'a koranke hu'ne,
Zebuluniga hageri ankenare umanigahane.
Isakaga hankave donkie,
Agrama kegeno knare manigsa kuma me'negeno,
Daniga kva (jas) vahe tro hunka vaheka'a kegava hugahane. Mago naga Israeli kevufi manigahaze.
Ha' osifavemo kamofo ankenare mani'neno, hosimofo agamerumpafi amprigeno, agumpifi vu'nea ne'mo amefigati asga hurami'ne.
Ra Anumzamoka nahoke ahesnanegu, kavega ante'na mani'noe.
Gatiga kumza vahe'mo'za kahegahaze.
Asaga hentofa ne'za eri fore hugahane.
Naftaliga, afi a' afu dia atregeno agareno viankna nehunka,
Josefega zafa azankunamo raga renteankna hugahane,
Ha' vahekamo'za atireti hanaveti'za hara hunegante'za,
Hianagi Jekopu Anumzamo'a Josefena hankavea aminkeno azamo'a oragesigeno, kevema ahesiana hantaga osugahie.
Na'ankure Jekopu'na negafa'na Anumzamo kaza nehuno,
Kagri negafa'na asomumo'a nagri nagehe'i asomura agatereno mevava agonagna huno mareri'ne,
Benzameniga afi ha' kragna (wolf) hugahane.
Ama ana maka 12fu'a Israeli nagakino, nezmafa'a mago mago naga nofi'ma mani'naza avamente asomu kea huzmantetere hu'nea naneke.

Jekopu'a amanage huno mofavre naga'amokizmia zamasmi'ne, Nagrama fri'na vahe'ni'ane umani knanimo'a kofta nehie. Hagi nafahe'ima ase zamante'naza mopare, havegampi ome asenanteho. Hiti ne' Efroni mopama mizama se'nefi ome asenanteho.
Makapela havegampi Mamre kuma tvaonte Kenani mopa agu'afi, Abrahamu'ma ana mopane havegane vahe asente'zane huno Efroni'pinti'ma mizama se'nea mopafi ome asenanteho.
E'i anampina Abrahamune nenaro Serane ase'znante'naze. Aisakine nenaro Rebekagiznia anampi ase znante'nafi, anampinke a'ni'a Liana asente'noe.
Ana mopane havegane Hiti ne' mofavrefinti miza se'neane.
Anagema huno mofavre naga'amokizmi zamasmi vaga reteno, agiararena sipare asuteno vagare asimu atreteno frino naga'ane umani'ne.
